page.title: 02Waldringfield: Description
page.content:
Waldringfield appears to be a very{ {seasonal}village.The life of the village certainly revolves around the river in{summer},when many boat owners and tourists venture onto the river Deben,and sail from Woodbridge to Felixstowe Ferry-stopping off en route at Waldringfield.
The village has a{pub-the Maybush} ,which can easily be seen from the river,since it flies a{Tolly Cobbold} (brewery) flag from its flagpole,and has a large Maybush in its scenic garden.There are two boatyards and {river trips}are run on{Jumna}.
The{local shop}stocks many items useful to waterising holidaymakers-tins,ready sauces,pasta,simply prepared food etc. -obviously with the tourist in mind.
